snippet: A 1983 Honda Accord, the first produced in the United States, got a lot of attention at the Detroit auto show.
abstract: A 1983 Honda Accord, the first produced in the United States, got a lot of attention at the Detroit auto show, from both students of history and the nostalgia-minded.
lead_paragraph: A 1983 Honda Accord, the first produced in the United States, got a lot of attention at the Detroit auto show.

headline.seo: That Square 1980s Accord Looks Hip Today
headline.main: Square Then, but Looking Rather Hip Today
headline.print_headline: Square Then, but Looking Rather Hip Today
